revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Atlas]]
[[Category:Cities]]

__TOC__
== Notes ==
The city of Britain, home of Lord British, founded on Compassion.

Virtue: Compassion

[[Sigil]]: Portals - A bonus [[Random Dungeon Adventure]] portal will appear in the owning Faction's base.

[[Control Point]]: Bloodshed - Causes your body to be unchoppable anywhere in the overworld, but not dungeons. Does not work account-wide.

== [[:Category:Places of Interest|Places of Interest]] ==
[[File:Map_britain.jpg]]

*1. Moongate
*2. Animal Farm - Pigs
*3. Guard Tower - Safe zone, cannot be attacked or stolen from here.
*4. Lord British's Castle, as well as the [[True Britannians]]' Base.
*5. [[Blackjack]] and [[Poker]] Dealer
*6. [[Platinum Vendor]]
*7. [[Unique Wares Vendor]]
*8. [[Defiled Crypt]] - Young Player Dungeon
*9. [[Order]] Recruiter and Shield Giver
*10. [[Raffle Ticket]] Vendors
*11. [[Chaos]] Recruiter and Shield Giver
*12. The [[Janitor]]
*13. [[The Elder's Hall]] - Young Player Help building - Free items for (young) players here.
*14. Recruitment stones for all 4 [[Factions]].
*15. Several custom vendors: [[Exotic Item Vendor]], [[Wearables Vendor]], [[Ethereal Mounts Vendor]], [[Battle Goblin Well]]
*16. The Fabled "Skill Gain" Well - Basically just free water to keep your character hydrated. Being fed and hydrated can have a small impact on skill success rates, therefore this is sometimes referred to as the Skill Gain well.
*17. Entrance to custom dock with PVP [[Tournament]] stages and a [[Bank]]. You cannot be attacked or stolen from here thus making it an ideal spot to trade with other players.
*18. [[Bomberman]] game stone
*19. Britain Graveyard
*20. Lord Blackthorn's Castle
*21. [[Britain Crafting Area]] - While here you receive a chance to craft [[Slayer]] weapons, a %10 bonus chance to craft exceptional items, and will use %20 less resources.
*22. Theater
*23. Chamber of Virtue
*24. [[Sigil]] stand - Sigil of Portals - A bonus [[Random Dungeon Adventure]] portal will appear in the owning Faction's base. For use in [[Factions]].
*25. [[Britain Sewers]]
*26. [[Control Point]] of Bloodshed - Causes your body to be unchoppable anywhere in the overworld, but not dungeons. Does not work account-wide. For use in [[Factions]].
*27. [[Pirate]] NPC with information on [[Whirlpool]]s.
